name: Progressive 13min Climb
description:
3 climbs of 13 minutes in duration today, but each one is climbed using a different cadence. But as the power ramps up between steps, you self select your cadence before returning to the set cadence. Just like a climb outdoors, the required power will increase throughout the 13 minutes. Culminating with 1 min above threshold at the top of the climb. Position yourself on the bike as you would on a long climb.
